### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure to move closer to the target position when attempting to connect pipes. The maximum distance for placing pipes is 10 tiles.

### Errors when locating entities
- Verify the position of the lab entity before attempting to access it. If the lab is not present at the specified coordinates, a new lab must be placed.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
